00027    /* 
00028    * Constructor.
00029    */
00030    NvtNhIntegrator::NvtNhIntegrator(MdSystem& system)
00031     : MdIntegrator(system),
00032       T_target_(1.0),
00033       T_kinetic_(1.0),
00034       xi_(0.0),
00035       xiDot_(0.0),
00036       tauT_(1.0),
00037       nuT_(1.0),
00038       energyEnsemblePtr_(0)
00039    {
00040       // Note: Within the constructor, the method parameter "system" hides 
00041       // the system() method name.
00042 
00043       // Precondition
00044       if (!system.energyEnsemble().isIsothermal() ) {
00045          UTIL_THROW("System energy ensemble is not isothermal");
00046       }
00047 
00048       energyEnsemblePtr_ = &(system.energyEnsemble());
00049       T_target_          = energyEnsemblePtr_->temperature();
00050       T_kinetic_         = T_target_;
00051 
00052    }
00053 
00054    /* 
00055    * Destructor.   
00056    */
00057    NvtNhIntegrator::~NvtNhIntegrator() 
00058    {}
00059 
00060    /* 
00061    * Read parameter and configuration files, initialize system.
00062    */
00063    void NvtNhIntegrator::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00064    {
00065       read<double>(in, "dt",   dt_);
00066       read<double>(in, "tauT", tauT_);
00067       nuT_ = 1.0/tauT_;
00068       T_target_  = energyEnsemblePtr_->temperature();
00069       T_kinetic_ = T_target_;
00070       xiDot_ = 0.0;
00071       xi_    = 0.0;
00072 
00073       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00074       if (!prefactors_.isAllocated()) {
00075          prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00076       }
00077 
00078    }
00079 
00080    void NvtNhIntegrator::setup() 
00081    {
00082       double mass, dtHalf;
00083       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00084       int nAtom  = system().nAtom();
00085 
00086       T_kinetic_ = system().kineticEnergy()*2.0/double(3*nAtom);
00087       T_target_ = energyEnsemblePtr_->temperature();
00088       xiDot_ = (T_kinetic_/T_target_ -1.0)*nuT_*nuT_;
00089       xi_ = 0.0;
00090 
00091       dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00092       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00093          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00094          prefactors_[i] = dtHalf/mass;
00095       }
00096    }
00097 
00098    /*
00099    * Nose-Hoover integrator step.
00100    *
00101    * This implements a reversible Velocity-Verlet MD NVT integrator step.
00102    *
00103    * Reference: Winkler, Kraus, and Reineker, J. Chem. Phys. 102, 9018 (1995).
00104    */
00105    void NvtNhIntegrator::step() 
00106    {
00107       Vector  dv;
00108       Vector  dr;
00109       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00110       double  dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00111       double  prefactor;
00112       double  factor;
00113       Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00114       int  iSpecies, nSpecies;
00115       int  nAtom;
00116 
00117       T_target_ = energyEnsemblePtr_->temperature();
00118       nSpecies  = simulation().nSpecies();
00119       nAtom     = system().nAtom();
00120 
00121       factor = exp(-dtHalf*(xi_ + xiDot_*dtHalf));
00122 
00123       // 1st half velocity Verlet, loop over atoms 
00124       for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00125          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00126          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00127 
00128             molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00129             for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00130 
00131                atomIter->velocity() *= factor;
00132 
00133                prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00134                dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00135                //dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), dtHalf);
00136 
00137                atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00138                dr.multiply(atomIter->velocity(), dt_);
00139 
00140                atomIter->position() += dr;
00141 
00142             }
00143 
00144          }
00145       }
00146 
00147       // First half of update of xi_
00148       xi_ += xiDot_*dtHalf;
00149 
00150       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00151       // Rebuild the pair list if necessary
00152       if (!system().pairPotential().isPairListCurrent()) {
00153          system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00154       }
00155       #endif
00156 
00157       system().calculateForces();
00158 
00159       // 2nd half velocity Verlet, loop over atoms
00160       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00161          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00162          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00163             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00164                prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00165                dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00166                atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00167                atomIter->velocity() *=factor;
00168             }
00169          }
00170       }
00171 
00172       // Update xiDot and complete update of xi_
00173       T_kinetic_ = system().kineticEnergy()*2.0/double(3*nAtom);
00174       xiDot_     = (T_kinetic_/T_target_ -1.0)*nuT_*nuT_;
00175       xi_       += xiDot_*dtHalf;
00176 
00177    }
00178 
00179    /*
00180    * Save the internal state to an archive.
00181    */
00182    void NvtNhIntegrator::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00183    {  
00184       ar & dt_;
00185       ar & T_target_;
00186       ar & T_kinetic_;
00187       ar & xi_;
00188       ar & xiDot_;
00189       ar & tauT_;
00190       ar & nuT_;
00191       ar & prefactors_;
00192    }
00193 
00197    void NvtNhIntegrator::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00198    {  
00199       ar & dt_;
00200       ar & T_target_;
00201       ar & T_kinetic_;
00202       ar & xi_;
00203       ar & xiDot_;
00204       ar & tauT_;
00205       ar & nuT_;
00206       ar & prefactors_;
00207    }
